short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Stream App for system monitoring and alerts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dailystream.com Employee Monitoring Software Chrome Extension. Allows broadcasting of screens, reviving notifications, and monitoring employee status without having to login into the website directly.
